last_price_tooltip: Fill in the current last price

close_order.confirm_message: Do you want to close your order with ticket #{{value}} ?
close_order.future_note: * Eco Close mode will close your order by placing Limit order close to the current price and get a discount on fees compared to normal order. See details at

calulator.description: See what the potential risk and reward will be in monetary terms on any give trade. Use our Futures Calculator to establish your potential profit/loss on a future trade. Read
calulator.liq_price_description: Your open positions will be taken into consideration when calculating the liquidation price. Unrealized PNL and maintenance margin of your open position will affect the calculation of liquidation price.

leverage.title: Adjust Leverage
leverage.description: Selecting higher leverage such as [10x] increases your liquidation risk. Always manage your risk levels. See help articles for more information.

tp_sl.is_will: , it will trigger Take Profit Market order to clos this position. Estimate PNL will be
tp_sl.this_setting: This setting applies to the entire position.
tp_sl.automaticcally_cancel: automaticcally cancel after closing the position. A market order is triggerd when the stop price is reached. The order will be rejected if the position size exceeds the Max Market Order by Qty limit.

preferences.order_confirmation_will_be: Order Confirmation will be required every time an order is submitted if this function is enabled. This setting only applies to USD-M-Futures
preferences.in_the_one_way_mode: In the One-way Mode, one contract can only hold positions in one direction.
preferences.in_the_hedge_way_mode: In the Hedge-way Mode, one contract can only hold positions in both long and short directions at the same time, and hedge positions in different directions under the same contract.
preferences.if_there_are_open_positions: If there are open positions or open orders in the contract, you are not allowed to adjust the position mode. Position mode adjustments are effective for all contracts. This setting only applies to USD-M Futures
preferences.notification_limit_is_up: Notification limit is up to 25 per day per user. This includes 5 order types. Take Profit/Stop Lost Limit, Take Profit/Stop Loss Market, and Trailing Stop.
preferences.you_will_be_notified_when: You will be notified when expected funding rate charged reaches.
preferences.you_will_be_notified_of: You will be notifed of the following events via Email / SMS/ Inmail. You can turn the notification on/off. This setting applies to both USD-M Futures and COIN-M Futures

close_all.close_all_modal: Do you want to close all your orders?
close_all.close_loss_modal: Do you want to close all your loss orders?
close_all.close_profit_modal: Do you want to close all your profit orders?
close_all.close_pending_modal: Do you want to close all your pending orders?
close_all.close_active_modal: Do you want to close all your active orders?
